about_the_game:
Game Description

Welcome to Finding Pots & Pets, a charming hidden object game set in the magical world of Bunnyland. Immerse yourself in beautifully crafted pixel art environments as you search for adorable animals and exquisite pots. This relaxing adventure offers a perfect blend of nostalgia and modern gameplay, inviting players of all ages to explore and discover at their own pace.

Key Features

  • Explore 9 intricate levels, each hiding over 200 unique pets and pots, totaling more than 2,000 items to discover.

  • Interact with a diverse cast of over 20 quirky NPCs, each with their own personality and stories.

  • Stuck? Use our intuitive hint system to help you along your journey.

  • Lose yourself in the stunning pixel art landscapes of Bunnyland, from lush gardens to cozy cottages.

  • Enjoy a stress-free gaming experience with soothing background music and gentle sound effects.

  • Challenge yourself to find special bonus items hidden in each level.

  • Save your progress and continue your adventure whenever you like.

Dive into the enchanting world of Finding Pots & Pets and let the hunt begin! Can you uncover all the secrets Bunnyland has to offer? Start your whimsical journey today and discover the joy of finding the cutest pets and most beautiful pots in this pixelated paradise.
